title: Play School: Everybody Sing!
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Education of children
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television programs for children
abstract: One hour special episode of ABC TV children's series 'Play School'.
description: 'Everybody Sing!' is a one hour special presentation exploring the world of music, sound and making music and contains 33 terrific songs including Miss Polly had a Dolly, Der Glumph went the Little Green Frog, Three Jelly Fish, The Toothbrush Song, The Wobbly Walk, The Bear Hunt, Goldilocks - The Musical, Baa Baa Black Sheep and lots more. Presenters include Colin Buchanan, Benita Collings, Trisha Goddard, John Hamblin, Noni Hazlehurst, Angela Moore, Philip Quast, George Spartels, Monica Trapaga.
